verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus bids us shine, With a clear, pure light, Like a little candle Burning in the night; In this world of darkness We must shine, You in your small corner, And I in mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus bids us shine, First of all for Him; Well He sees and knows it If our light is dim; He looks down from heaven, Sees us shine, You in your small corner, And I in mine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus bids us shine, Then, for all around Many kinds of darkness In this world abound-- Sin, and want, and sorrow: We must shine, You in your small corner, And I in mine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus bids us shine, As we work for Him, Bringing those that wander From the paths of sin; He will ever help us, If we shine, You in your small corner, And I in mine.
